name: Flying Superhero Captain Girl
description:
"Flying Superhero Captain Girl" Newyork City War is hunting the hero to fight in fighting for taking revenge from the Robot mafia. 

The Immortal hero have converted a peaceful city into a crime city. Many brave fighter, steel soldiers and street crime fighter have stepped forward for the protection of their city.

This hero has been there for the civilians through every problem. But as the chaos has turned into a Deep Combat mission so the flying superhero, Real Superhero, professional, and Captain fighter have been called out for the Battle.

Game Features
1. Realistic 3d battles
2. City Rescue Game
3. Interesting, challenging and User friendly gameplay
4. Heavy updated weapons and gadgets
5. HD quality audios and videos.
